name: Primitive Shields
desc: This ship carries an early branch of shield technology that never became widespread. These shields are very efficient but have a limited duration and must regularly recharge or go offline to reset.
short: Shields that can only be used for brief periods regardless of flux level.

name: Knight Refit
desc: This ship has been overhauled by the militant arm of the Luddic Church. Considered antiquated by some, these hulls were outfitted with extensive modular armor plates for protection, optimized primarily for ballistics, and equipped with primitive capacitor based shield emitters.
short: Ballistic weapons in composite slots increase flux stats. Speed increases when modules are lost.

name: Stormrider
desc:
Built into the central hull of every Stormbreak class ship lies a massive toroidal magnetic hyperstorm shield.
 
Redirects hyperstorm strikes to generally align with your current fleets heading. Decreases the effect hyperstorm strikes has on combat readiness by %s for the entire fleet; also has half the effect for operations in a solar corona .

name: Oracle
desc: Covered from stem to stern with every type of scanner known to exist, the Oracle Sensor Suite provides unmatched early warning, navigation charting, and command-and-control capabilities.

name: Auxiliary Integration
desc: Decreases the ordnance points cost of all small weapons, point-defense weaponry and all types of fighters by %s.
sprite: data/strings/com/fs/starfarer/api/impl/campaign/you can hear it cant you/our whispers through the void/our song/graphics/hullmods/zea_edf_amabuff.png

name: Dawntide
desc: While superficially similar to Domain droneships at first glance, these exotic hulls have been heavily modified; All Dawntide-vessels feature dynamic targeting systems and bulky environmental plating, with larger vessels utilizing specialized nanoforges to maintain a small array of shield drones.
sprite: data/strings/com/fs/starfarer/api/impl/campaign/you can hear it cant you/our whispers through the void/our song/graphics/hullmods/zea_dawn_cascade.png

name: Duskfall
desc: An array of exotic machinery of unknown origin, readings indicate massive amounts of power are being routed through these systems. The ship's experimental phase coils perfectly adapt to rising flux levels, handling unimaginable levels of hardflux compared to standard domain coils, all without losing any performance.
sprite: data/strings/com/fs/starfarer/api/impl/campaign/you can hear it cant you/our whispers through the void/our song/graphics/hullmods/zea_dusk_phasecoils.png

name: Elysian Engineering
desc: This vessel has been designed to fight within the blistering Elysian Abyss. Tightly integrated systems draw stellar radiation into specialized capacitors, then expend it to supercharge weapons and engines. PD Drones clear physical hazards - be they rocks or missiles - from realspace.
sprite: data/strings/com/fs/starfarer/api/impl/campaign/you can hear it cant you/our whispers through the void/our song/graphics/hullmods/zea_edf_eng.png

name: Conformal Shield
desc: This ship is equipped with a custom shield emitter that keeps its front shield close to the hull. The shield arc is fixed and cannot exceed %s degrees, while the emitter is locked to face directly forward, regardless of the shield type installed.
